strings:
<voice_0x01000E73><se_low>King Clavius: The magic mirror!? But it's a precious royal heirloom. Why on earth do you require it!?
Explain yourself!
<voice_0x01000E74><se_low>King Clavius: I understand. However, as I have said, the magic mirror is a treasure of the royal family. I cannot simply give it to you.
<voice_0x01000E75><se_low>Yangus: I knew 'e'd say no...
<voice_0x01000E76><se_def>Angelo: C'est la vie, I suppose. It was a lot to ask.
<voice_0x01000E77><se_high>Jessica: So now what? How are we going to avenge my brother's death without that mirror?
<voice_0x01000E78>King Clavius: Hmm...
<voice_0x01000E79><se_low>King Clavius: If what you say is true, you must have survived a great many ordeals on your travels.
<voice_0x01000E7A><se_low>King Clavius: That means your fighting skills must be on a par with those of my soldiers.

<voice_0x01000E7B><se_low>*: B-But Your Majesty!
You can't possibly plan to use those travellers instead of royal guardsmen!?
<voice_0x01000E7C><se_low>King Clavius: Well surmised, Chancellor.
<voice_0x01000E7D><se_low>King Clavius: Listen to me carefully, <hero>. I rule with a fair hand. But I cannot grant every request that is made of me.

<voice_0x01000E7E><se_low>King Clavius: However, if the royal family owes someone
a debt of gratitude, I consider it my duty to
fulfil it.
<voice_0x01000E7F><se_low>King Clavius: You need the magic mirror. Then accept my request. If you complete the task I set forth for you, you may have the mirror.
<voice_0x01000E80><se_low>King Clavius: Summon the Prince.
<voice_0x01000E81><se_def>*: At once, Your Majesty.
<voice_0x01000E82><se_low>King Clavius: The request concerns my son, Prince Charmles.
<voice_0x01000E83><se_low>King Clavius: To become King of Argonia, one must undertake a special initiation ceremony. There is some risk to life and limb. And the Prince is unwilling to do it.
<voice_0x01000E84><se_low>King Clavius: As a father, the thought of putting my own son in danger pains me. But he must pass the initiation if he is to succeed me to the throne.
<voice_0x01000E85><se_low>King Clavius: It is the tradition of our kingdom.

<voice_0x01000E86><se_low>King Clavius: I was considering sending a detail of royal soldiers to protect him during the rite.
However, I fear it will ruin his reputation.
<voice_0x01000E87><se_low>King Clavius: So my request is this: you outsiders will accompany my son to the royal hunting ground. Naturally, this would remain completely confidential.
<voice_0x01000E88><se_low>King Clavius: It is vital that everyone believes my son passed the initiation on his own.
<voice_0x01000E89><se_def>*: Y-Your Majesty! Prince Charmles is<endash>
<voice_0x01000E8A><se_low>King Clavius: What is it this time...?

<voice_0x01000E8B><se_def>*: The Prince has run off again!
I'm extremely sorry, Your Majesty!
This is all my fault!

<voice_0x01000E8C><se_def>*: I will bring Prince Charmles to Your Majesty as soon as we can find him!
As your humble and faithful servant I beg<endash>
<voice_0x01000E8D><se_low>King Clavius: You incompetent FOOL!

<voice_0x01000E8E><se_low>King Clavius: Please pardon my outburst, <hero>.
But we cannot continue this discussion without my son.
